# WARNING | PUMAS | Some species, NO, HNO3, do not have optimized correlated-k tables for the defined moderate resolutions, and will be analyzed at sub-par resolutions. In particular, there will be issues at the line cores.
# WARNING | PUMAS | The maximum asymmetry has been capped to 0.20 for these high observing angles.
# WARNING | PUMAS | The aerosols require higher scattering requirements, of NMAX:1 and LMAX:5, for the selected aerosols having a max g of 0.20.
